text:
Additional Suggestions For NAEB Board or Committee Consideration
1. Will there be any money available for regional meetings this year?
2. Will there be any opportunity for regions to sit together at any
convention dinner or luncheon? I feel that, if we want to build
regional unity, we need to have a chance to meet the people in the
region.
3. Promotion Sheets for all programs offered on the Network,
Would it be possible to send promotion sheets for each series and
perhaps for each program, similar to those sent out for THE WAYS
OF MANKIND and JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE?
The more staffs are cut the harder it is to find time to do a good
job of publicity. I feel that this help would be welcomed all over
the country. We certainly stamp our stations by the quality of our
news releases.
cc-Mr. Ausmus
Mr. Schooley
Mr. Segiel
